project_overview.title: Fit-to-Work Voice Readiness Checker
project_overview.objective: Automated assessment of worker readiness through voice analysis for workplace safety

challenges_and_solutions.challenge: Speech Recognition Accuracy in Noisy Environments
challenges_and_solutions.solution: Implemented ambient noise filtering and adaptive thresholds
challenges_and_solutions.learning: Audio preprocessing significantly impacts recognition quality

challenges_and_solutions.solution: Multi-feature approach combining pitch, energy, and spectral analysis
challenges_and_solutions.learning: Robust feature extraction compensates for individual differences

challenges_and_solutions.solution: Optimized feature extraction pipeline and efficient algorithms
challenges_and_solutions.learning: Balance between accuracy and processing speed is crucial

future_improvements: Machine Learning model training with larger datasets
Integration with wearable devices for continuous monitoring
Advanced emotion recognition using deep learning
Personalized adaptation based on individual patterns
